name: POST - As a user i am not able to make a thread with Invalid Data

testSteps.description: 1: POST - As a user i am not able to make a thread with Invalid Data ({data=invalid, status_code=500, error_message=data_not_found})

children.description: Given I set an endpoint for make a thread
When I request POST thread with "invalid"
POST http://44.206.244.111/v1/thread/

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS
Access-Control-Allow-Headers: x-requested-with, Authorization, Content-Type, credential, X-Import-Process, X-XSRF-TOKEN
Access-Control-Max-Age: 3600
Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true
X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff
X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block
Cache-Control: no-cache, no-store, max-age=0, must-revalidate
Pragma: no-cache
Expires: 0
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Date: Thu, 21 Jul 2022 09:03:31 GMT
Connection: close

children.description: Then I validate the status code 500
And I get thread "data_not_found"

userStory.narrative:
As a user
  i want to make a thread
  so that people can see my thread
